captions.text: So here we are in Pyengchangdong, we're filming a TV show about eating kimchi,
it seems really appropriate that they called us cause we have a site called eatyourkimchi
That's us! We're eat your kimchi! Anyhow, right now our first house is in front of the Green House
this is supposedly where they filmed that very famous scene from Secret Garden
something about cappuccino on the nose--OH MY GAWD! It's totally (stupid) it's that scene
WAIT! SHH!! It's that scene where she's drinking a cappuccino and she gets the foam on her upper lip
and he's all like, "You do that on purpose" and she's all like, "I don't" and he licks it. Okay, I'm out!
I don't know it's a stupid show,  I didn't see it.  All I know is I watched Martina watch it
and she cried a lot and then she held my hand afterwards--BE QUIET!-
This has nothing to do with eating kimchi but here's our video!!!!
[chipper guitar adventure music solo]
Alright, so our hard work today, this is our final product, it's Cabbage Heart Water Kimchi
and actually, we've never had anything like this before,
it's kind of like sweet and salty, and I'd really love this all covered in noodles.
OH MY GAWD SIMON!!! NOOOOOODLES!!!!
Now the thing about this kimchi is it's very sour and refreshing so it's more like
a palate cleansers in-between bites of a meal.
It's not something that, I'm really used to,
having a cold, watery, spicy, and sweet kimchi all at once,
but it's still very wonderful and you really get used to it.
UGHH!!!!!
I can really see this---HEY HEYYYY! Share with others! HEEEY!!!
[gong]
